name: cook
description: used to calculate the price of the food based on the ingredient price that are previously stored using /ingredient

tips.name: ​
tips.value: You can also store default return rate and usage fee using /returnrate and /usage respectively

name: ingredient
description: used to store the price of ingredients in the database

tips.name: ​
tips.value: This ingredient price is used for every food that you calculate using /cook

name: usage
description: used to store the default usage fee in the database

tips.name: ​
tips.value: This usage fee is used for every food that you calculate using /cook

name: returnrate
description: used to store the default return rate in the database

tips.name: ​
tips.value: This return rate is used for every food that you calculate using /cook

name: food info
description: used to get info about the ingredients needed for the food and its price
